ClearAllButtonBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of the clear all button.

mainScriptObject.summary: The GameObject that stores the central data for the running of the program.

clearDialogPanel.summary: The GameObject that contains the panel with the clear confirmation message and buttons.

OnClearAllButtonPress.summary: Called when the clear all button is pressed.

ResetButtonBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of the reset button.

mainScriptObject.summary: The GameObject that stores the central data for the running of the program.

piecesScrollView.summary: The GameObject contains the scroll panel with all the contraption pieces.

startStopObject.summary: The GameObject that contains a StartStopButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the start/stop button.

pieceControlsPanel.summary: The GameObject that contains the panel with the piece controls buttons.

OnResetButtonPress.summary: Called when the reset button is pressed.

setResettable.summary: Setter for the private resettable property. Also sets the reset button's interactable property, and changes the appearance of the start/stop button, if applicable.
setResettable.param: A bool representing the new resettable or non-resettable state.

getResettable.summary: Getter for the private resettable property.
getResettable.returns: The current value of resettable, a bool.

StartStopButtonBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of the start/stop button.

mainScriptObject.summary: The GameObject that stores the central data for the running of the program.

pieceControlsPanel.summary: The GameObject that contains the panel with the piece controls buttons.

piecesScrollView.summary: The GameObject contains the scroll panel with all the contraption pieces.

playImg.summary: The Sprite used for the start/stop button while it's a "start"/"resume"/"play" button.

pauseImg.summary: The Sprite used for the start/stop button while it's a "stop"/"pause" button.

clearAllObject.summary: The GameObject that contains a ClearAllButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the clear all button.

workspaceBoundariesObject.summary: The parent GameObject that contains all the workspace boundaries (walls and floor).

physicsOn.summary: A bool representing whether or not the machine is currently executing according to the laws of physics.

OnStartStopPress.summary: Called when the reset button is pressed.

setButtonState.summary: Sets the visible state (i.e. the text and color) of the button.
setButtonState.param: The new state of the button. Can be "start", "pause", or "resume".
